DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine whether person-centered high-intense aerobic / strength train five month reduce inflammation disease activity , improve immune cell function , increase muscle strength , fitness ability individual independence elderly patient rheumatoid arthritis .
DOC.brief_title: Improved Ability Cope With Everyday Life Through Person-centered Training Program Elderly Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis - PEP-walk Study
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Patients 65 year old RA diagnose accord ACR / EULAR 1987/2010 criterion , disease duration 2 year , disease activity measure DAS28 < 5.1 Exclusion Comorbidities , unstable coronary artery disease , uncontrolled cardiac arrhythmia , uncontrolled high blood pressure , prevents moderate intense exercise . Joint surgery complete within 6 month prior study entry . Ongoing train moderate high level 2 time per week
